data.message: One of our employees created an account for The Institute For Health Education on facebook and no longer works with her. We do not have the username password to edit/ use it. Someone has hacked in to the account. Will you please be able to delete the page for us.

replies.message:
Thanks for your question, Vasudha. The best thing you can do is contact the Page admin and ask her to add you as an admin in order to delete this Page.

If you think the admin's account was hacked get help here: http://on.fb.me/SJQKRJ -Leigh
Facebook   s there an issue going on at the moment??? I keep getting a msg that says temp unavailable every now and again
you should look at that and see what your doing wrong and how to change it
